meanings.definition: Used to express negation or refusal.
meanings.sent1: I do na want to go to the store.

meanings.definition: A unit of force equal to the force that would give a mass of one kilogram an acceleration of one meter per second per second.

meanings.definition: A Japanese syllabary used in writing words borrowed from foreign languages.
